title: Can We Have Hide And Seek Back Please
body:
Personally, my friends and I love to play hide and seek and now that dominion is gone it is really hard to play hide and seek, we manage to play on summoners rift but it is a pain for the levelling system, the minions, towers etc.

I was hoping that maybe we could have Hide and Seek as a rotating game mode or at least allow it for custom use.

replies.body: What do you mean by hide and seek? It sounds interesting
